techmeme.title: Swedish startup Mynt, which offers smart expense cards for SMEs, raised €22M led by Vor Capital, a source says at a ~€200M valuation, and claims 12K SME clients (Ingrid Lunden/TechCrunch)
Similarweb: X's US DAUs dropped by 8.4% from 32.3M to 29.6M between early October 2024 and now, while Bluesky's US DAUs rose 1,064% from 254,500 to ~2.7M (Raphael Boyd/The Guardian)
A look at the relationship between Tether and Trump transition co-Chair Howard Lutnick, who boasted of Cantor Fitzgerald handling $10B in redemptions in 2022 (Financial Times)
Sweden's financial regulator fines Klarna $50M and reprimands the BNPL company for breaking anti-money laundering rules between 2021 and 2022 (Richard Milne/Financial Times)
OpenAI rolls out Canvas, its side-by-side digital editing space, to all ChatGPT users and adds new features, including support for Python and more text pasting (Emilia David/VentureBeat)
